mapper.sql: bydate, targetId, campaignId, profileid, adGroupId, targetingType, targetingExpression, targetingText, impressions, clicks, cost, attributedConversions14d, attributedConversions14dSameSKU, attributedSales14d, attributedSales14dSameSKU
mapper.insert:
replace into t_amz_adv_rpt2_hsa_product_targets ( targetId, campaignId, profileid, adGroupId, bydate, impressions, clicks, cost, opttime) values
( #{adv.targetid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adv.campaignid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adv.profileid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adv.adgroupid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adv.bydate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{adv.impressions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adv.clicks,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adv.cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{adv.opttime,jdbcType=DATE} )

replace into t_amz_adv_rpt2_hsa_product_targets_attributed ( targetId,bydate, attributedConversions14d, attributedConversions14dSameSKU, attributedSales14d, attributedSales14dSameSKU) values
( #{adv.targetid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adv.bydate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{adv.attributedconversions14d,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adv.attributedconversions14dsamesku,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adv.attributedsales14d,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adv.attributedsales14dsamesku,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.select:
select
t.bydate,
tc.name campaignName,'' targetingText,'' targetingType, sum(impressions) impressions, sum(clicks) clicks, sum(cost) Spend, ifnull((sum(clicks) / sum(impressions)),0) 'Click Thru Rate (CTR)', ifnull((sum(cost) / sum(t.clicks)),0) 'Cost Per Click (CPC)', ifnull(sum(attributedSales14d),0) '14 Day Total Sales', case when ifnull(sum(cost),0) > 0 and ifnull(sum(attributedSales14d),0) = 0 then 0 else ifnull((sum(cost) / sum(attributedSales14d)),0) end 'Total Advertising Cost of Sales (ACoS)', ifnull((sum(attributedSales14d) / sum(cost)),0) 'Total Return on Advertising Spend (RoAS)', ifnull(sum(attributedConversions14d),0) '14 Day Total Orders', ifnull(sum(attributedConversions14d),0) '14 Day Total Units', ifnull((sum(attributedConversions14d) / sum(clicks)),0) '14 Day Conversion Rate' from t_amz_adv_rpt2_hsa_product_targets t left join t_amz_adv_rpt2_hsa_product_targets_attributed tt on tt.targetId=t.targetId and tt.bydate=t.bydate left join t_amz_adv_campaigns_hsa tc on tc.campaignId = t.campaignId and tc.profileid = t.profileid where t.profileid = #{profileid,jdbcType=CHAR} and t.bydate <= #{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR} and t.bydate >= #{fromDate,jdbcType=CHAR}
group by t.bydate,t.targetId
group by tc.name,t.targetId
